name: CreateVercelTeam
description:
Create a new team in your Vercel account.

Use this tool to create a new team under your Vercel account by specifying a team slug, and optionally a team name. This is useful for organizing projects and members under a unified group.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The desired slug for the new team, used as a team identifier.

value_schema.description: The desired slug for the Team

parameters.name: team_name
parameters.description: The desired name for the Team. If not provided, it will be generated from the slug.

value_schema.description: The desired name for the Team. It will be generated from the provided slug if nothing is provided

parameters.name: session_referrer
parameters.description: Referrer URL for the session initiating the team creation process.

parameters.name: session_landing_page
parameters.description: The URL of the landing page where the session started. This is used for session attribution on Vercel.

parameters.name: signup_referrer_page
parameters.description: The referrer URL of the page before the signup page, used for tracking attribution.

parameters.name: utm_source
parameters.description: The UTM source identifier, indicating where the traffic originates from, such as a search engine or newsletter.

parameters.name: utm_medium
parameters.description: The medium through which the user arrived, such as email, social, or cpc.

parameters.name: utm_campaign_name
parameters.description: Specifies the UTM campaign name for tracking purposes when creating a team.

parameters.name: utm_term
parameters.description: The UTM term used for tracking specific keywords in marketing campaigns.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The desired slug for the Team

value_schema.description: The desired slug for the Team

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The desired name for the Team. It will be generated from the provided slug if nothing is provided

value_schema.description: The desired name for the Team. It will be generated from the provided slug if nothing is provided
